data.text: I have a mild stomachache after eating too quickly; it's not too severe.
I've been experiencing occasional stomach discomfort, but it's not too severe.
I have mild indigestion after a heavy meal; it's not severe.
I woke up with severe abdominal cramps and diarrhea; it's very severe.
I've been having persistent and severe acid reflux; it's very uncomfortable.
I experienced sudden and severe nausea and vomiting; it's distressing.
I feel mild bloating and gas after certain foods; it's not too severe.
I have severe abdominal pain that's been ongoing for hours; it's excruciating.
I've been experiencing occasional stomach cramps, but they are usually brief and not severe.
I have a persistent and severe upset stomach; it's been affecting my appetite.
